top_vendors.query: MATCH (p:Payee)<-[:PAID_TO]-(c:Contract) RETURN p.name AS vendor_name, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

top_departments.query: MATCH (d:Department)-[:MANAGED_BY]-(c:Contract) RETURN d.name AS department_name, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

top_contracts.query: MATCH (c:Contract) RETURN c.contract_id AS contract_id, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

top_vendors_by_spending.query: MATCH (p:Payee)<-[:PAID_TO]-(c:Contract) RETURN p.name AS vendor_name, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

departments_with_highest_spending.query: MATCH (d:Department)-[:MANAGED_BY]->(c:Contract) RETURN d.name AS department_name, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

top_expense_categories.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(ec:ExpenseCategory) RETURN ec.category AS expense_category, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

agency_spending_breakdown.query: MATCH (a:Agency)-[:HAS_CONTRACT]->(c:Contract) RETURN a.name AS agency_name, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC;

keywords: contracts linked to more than one agency
vendors with contracts in multiple agencies
contracts_with_multiple_agencies.query: MATCH (a:Agency)-[:HAS_CONTRACT]->(c:Contract)-[:PAID_TO]->(p:Payee) WITH p, COUNT(DISTINCT a) AS agency_count, COLLECT(c.contract_id) AS contract_ids WHERE agency_count > 1 RETURN p.name AS vendor_name, agency_count, contract_ids;

yearly_spending_trends.query: MATCH (c:Contract) RETURN c.fiscal_year AS year, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY year DESC;

woman_owned_business_spending.query: MATCH (p:Payee {woman_owned: true})-[:PAID_TO]->(c:Contract) RETURN p.name AS vendor_name, COUNT(c) AS contract_count, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC;

agency_spending_trends.query: MATCH (a:Agency)-[:HAS_CONTRACT]->(c:Contract) RETURN a.name AS agency_name, c.fiscal_year AS year, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY a.name, year DESC;

keywords: most money spent in budget codes
highest_budget_code_spending.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:UNDER_BUDGET]->(b:BudgetCode) RETURN b.code AS budget_code, b.description AS description, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

industry_breakdown_by_agency.query: MATCH (a:Agency)-[:HAS_CONTRACT]->(c:Contract)-[:BELONGS_TO_INDUSTRY]->(i:Industry) RETURN a.name AS agency_name, i.name AS industry, COUNT(c) AS contract_count ORDER BY contract_count DESC;

minority_business_spending.query: MATCH (p:Payee)-[:PAID_TO]->(c:Contract) WHERE p.mwbe_category IS NOT NULL RETURN p.mwbe_category AS diversity_category, COUNT(c) AS contract_count, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC;

largest_subvendors.query: MATCH (sv:SubVendor)<-[:HAS_SUBVENDOR]-(p:Payee)-[:PAID_TO]->(c:Contract) RETURN sv.name AS subvendor_name, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

spending_on_child_services.query: MATCH (a:Agency {name: 'Administration for Childrenâ€™s Services'})-[:HAS_CONTRACT]->(c:Contract) RETURN c.contract_id AS contract_id, c.purpose AS purpose, c.check_amount AS check_amount;

top_industries_by_spending.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:BELONGS_TO_INDUSTRY]->(i:Industry) RETURN i.name AS industry, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5;

expense_category_analysis.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(ec:ExpenseCategory) RETURN ec.category AS expense_category, COUNT(c) AS contract_count, SUM(c.check_amount) AS total_spending ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
